thread.title: Trump Jr. drops planned foreign policy speech in India

title: Trump Jr. drops planned foreign policy speech in India
text:
Trump Jr. drops planned foreign policy speech in India Friday, February 23, 2018 - 01:46 
U.S. President Donald Trump's son dropped a planned speech on foreign affairs in New Delhi on Friday and instead took part in a 'Fireside Chat' after ethics experts said he should avoid wading into policy issues as a private citizen.   
U.S. President Donald Trump's son dropped a planned speech on foreign affairs in New Delhi on Friday and instead took part in a 'Fireside Chat' after ethics experts said he should avoid wading into policy issues as a private citizen.  //reut.rs/2ENmcL1
